title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 166-2.5 - Location of records
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 166-2.5 - Location of records

State Regulations

Records shall be available for public inspection and
copying in the following locations: (a) New York State Division for Youth
84 Holland Avenue

Albany, NY 12208
(b) New York State Division for Youth

Adam Clayton Powell, Jr. State Office Building
163 West 125th Street
14th Floor

New York, NY 10027

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
§§
166-2.5

Amended

New

York State Register December 23, 2015/Volume XXXVII, Issue 51, eff. 12/23/2015

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
